description:
You are welcome to join the entrepreneur world by completing this course and starting your own business tomorrow! This is guaranteed!

After round 2 hours or less of your time investment you will learn by doing practical exercises:

  • What for do you need your business?
  • What stops you and how to remove roadblocks on your way?
  • How to find the right niche?
  • Start up without investing
  • Advertising in the right way
  • Marketing channels
  • Working with suppliers
  • Special bonus for most persistent

Having all the practical side (skills) of the knowledge in your pocket you will be able to start your business for extra income or full time! All is in a very simple language, easy and straight forward, Just the way I wanted it when I had started myself.

During the course you will have theory mixed with practical part, train your skills and get ready with your idea. I have shared in this course the main structure and plan of starting your own business. It's suitable for all types of startup because all of them have same structure: services and goods sales, or provider of services.

If you are that guy that is looking for the right time and resource to have some extra income or start your own business, this is the right class and the right moment!

I have included some theoretical and practical material in slide based lectures including special tasks for you to exercise straight away. There will be some additional links for readings and you will get a surprise after the course if you request for it :)
title: Startup MBA
